about_the_game:
Glitchpunk - Supporter Pack


The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for Glitchpunk, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.

Contents

  • The full Glitchpunk Soundtrack
  • An exclusive golden car in the game. So shiny!
  • An alternative in-game skin for the protagonist
  • The "Supporter Radio Station" to tune into in the game, featuring some music and a special jingle

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
